title: Late At Night: A Second Chance Romance
description: A woman trapped in a bland marriage, harboring a secret about her past.A wounded man battling his own demons, looking for love in all the wrong places.A story about innocence, deceit, and redemption.A second-chance romance bound to steal your heart.Anne Martin never thought she'd meet her high-school crush again. He had stolen her heart, took what he wanted and she never heard from him again. Until now. Almost eighteen years later, he is standing on her doorstep looking like sin itself, asking to undo what's already done.Jack Miller's tumultuous life leaves a lot to be desired. A wounded U.S. Air Force Combat Rescue Officer, Jack carries his own demons, lurking deep in his weary soul. A chance encounter with the woman he has hurt the most brings back unforgettable memories and a longing to make things right.Warning: This book contains cheating.
author: Anastacia K.
